DOC.brief_summary: This study will be conducted to assess adverse drug reactions, incidence of adverse events, and factors that may affect the safety and effectiveness of Humira for the treatment of Crohn's disease.
DOC.brief_title: Special Investigation in Patients With Crohn's Disease (All Patients Investigation)
DOC.criteria: All patients with moderate or severe active Crohn's disease who are not responding well to conventional therapy and receive Humira will be enrolled in the survey Contraindications according to the Package Insert Patients who have serious infections Patients who have tuberculosis Patients with a history of hypersensitivity to any ingredient of Humira Patients who have demyelinating disease or with a history of demyelinating disease Patients who have congestive cardiac failure
